00151 inline        void CCalibratedViewBase::SetCalibrationPtr(const i2d::ITransformation2d* calibrationPtr)
00152 {
00153        if (calibrationPtr != m_calibrationPtr){
00154               if (calibrationPtr != NULL){
00155                      m_calibrationPtr = calibrationPtr;
00156               }
00157               else{
00158                      m_calibrationPtr = &CNoneCalibration::GetInstance();
00159               }
00160 
00161               InvalidateBackground();
00162        }
00163 
00164        UpdateAllShapes(iview::IShape::CF_CALIB);
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00168 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetGridVisible(bool state)
00169 {
00170        if (m_isGridVisible != state){
00171               m_isGridVisible = state;
00172               InvalidateBackground();
00173        }
00174 }
00175 
00176 
00177 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetMinGridDistance(double gridDistance)
00178 {
00179        if (m_minGridDistance != gridDistance){
00180               m_minGridDistance = gridDistance;
00181               if (m_isGridVisible){
00182                      SetBackgroundBufferValid(false);
00183               }
00184        }
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00188 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetGridInMm(bool state)
00189 {
00190        if (m_isGridInMm != state){
00191               m_isGridInMm = state;
00192               SetBackgroundBufferValid(false);
00193        }
00194 }
